column2: Role & responsibilities:    Develop sales strategies and plans to achieve revenue targets for HVAC retrofit projects, AMCs, and service agreements. Analyze market trends, competitor activities, and customer requirements to tailor sales approaches and offerings effectively. Generate leads through various channels such as cold calling, networking, referrals, and industry events. Qualify leads based on criteria such as project scope, budget, timeline, and decision-making authority to prioritize sales efforts and maximize conversion rates. Prepare comprehensive proposals, bids, and presentations outlining HVAC retrofit solutions, AMC packages, and service offerings tailored to customer requirements. Present proposals to clients, highlighting value propositions, benefits, and ROI to secure sales agreements. Negotiate terms, pricing, and contract terms with clients to finalize HVAC retrofit projects, AMCs, and service agreements. Ensure contracts are legally compliant, financially viable, and mutually beneficial for both parties. Manage contract documentation and facilitate the signing process. Provide technical expertise and consultation to clients on HVAC system upgrades, retrofits, and maintenance requirements. Assess existing HVAC systems, identify inefficiencies, and recommend solutions to improve energy efficiency, reliability, and performance. Maintain regular communication with clients throughout the sales process and after project completion to address any concerns, feedback, or service requests promptly. Strive to exceed customer expectations and build long-term relationships to foster customer loyalty and retention. Track sales performance metrics, including pipeline development, conversion rates, revenue forecasts, and customer satisfaction scores. Generate regular reports and updates for management review to assess sales effectiveness and identify areas for improvement. Overall, as an HVAC Retrofit/AMC/Service Sales Engineer in an MEP contractor company, your role is pivotal in driving revenue growth, expanding market presence, and delivering value-added solutions to clients while ensuring customer satisfaction and retention. Preferred candidate profile : Sales experience of HVAC Service/ AMC/ O&M/ retrofit WhatsApp resume at 8657740446

column2: Position name: HVAC Technician Salary: 12000 to 15000 Qualification: ITI or Diploma Experience: 2 to 3yrs experience. Job Description: Window , split, cassette, ductable ac installation, service , troubleshooting. We are currently seeking a skilled and experienced HVAC Technician to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for installing, maintaining, and repairing HVAC systems for residential and commercial clients. Responsibilities: Install new HVAC systems, including furnaces, air conditioners, heat pumps, ductwork, and ventilation systems, according to specifications and building codes. Perform routine maintenance tasks, such as cleaning coils, replacing filters, lubricating moving parts, and checking refrigerant levels, to ensure optimal system performance and energy efficiency. Diagnose and troubleshoot HVAC system malfunctions, including electrical, mechanical, and control issues, and perform necessary repairs to restore functionality. Conduct regular inspections of HVAC systems to identify potential problems and recommend preventive maintenance measures. Respond to service calls from clients experiencing heating or cooling system failures, and provide timely and effective solutions to resolve issues. Coordinate with customers to schedule service appointments and communicate repair options and costs in a clear and professional manner. Keep accurate records of work performed, including service reports, equipment installations, and parts used, using computerized maintenance management systems (CMMS). Stay updated on industry trends, best practices, and technological advancements in HVAC systems and equipment. Adhere to safety protocols and standards to ensure a safe working environment for yourself and others. Provide guidance and support to junior technicians and apprentices, and assist with training as needed. Contact Details : 9943828030/ vishnupriya.a@cielhr.com Job Types: Full-time, Permanent Pay: 12,000.00 - 15,000.00 per month Schedule: Day shift Experience: total work: 2 years (Required) Work Location: In person
column11: Window, split, service, cassette, ductable ac installation, troubleshooting.
